description:
Born in Australia on October 4th, 2005, she was a normal policewoman before she joined the AMP. She uses to pick on and fight with police officer http://anidb.net/ch25721 [Ralph Bowmers] but these two are getting closer over time.
Her police unit has been slaughtered by a Megadyne (cyborg) named "http://anidb.net/ch25825 [Wire]"; originally a normal human, she got 70% of her body cybercoated in order to take revenge on him, lending her superhuman speed and power.
name: Kiddy Phenil
